DOC.brief_summary: This trial investigate relationship concentration anesthetic drug propofol exhale breath , blood drug effect volunteer undergo general anesthesia . The main goal study develop pharmacokinetic - dynamic model propofol exhale breath .
DOC.brief_title: Monitoring Exhaled Propofol Individualize General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: 18 year age Written inform consent Ability willingness give write informed consent American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) risk score I Volunteers ASA physical status II III Pregnancy Volunteers history neurological disease stroke Volunteers history recreational drug abuse Volunteers history alcohol abuse Smokers Anesthesia within 6 month Known drug allergy History adverse event general anesthesia
